content: I think Moulin Rouge! might be up my alley. I've heard great things about the musical, and I've been listening to the soundtrack of The Book of Mormon since March 1st, 2022, which has a similar irreverent and over-the-top style. I'm hoping to score tickets to a touring production of The Book of Mormon soon, and I think Moulin Rouge! might be a great fit for me as well.
